type: Legendary Creature – Human Cleric Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Ragnarok[/i] – {R}{G}{W}, Sacrifice Celica, Caring Princess: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn, then Celica, deals 2 damage to each creature.
[i]Promote[/i] – When Celica enters, if she was not cast, transform her.
Partner with Alm, Hero of Prophecy
